ModMetaData.name: Eltex Weaponry
ModMetaData.author: Sir Van, Elseud
ModMetaData.description: Expands the Rimworld arsenal with eltex firearms - ultratech weapons that increase and decrease in damage dealt based on psychic sensitivity of their wielder and target. Also comes with a powerful warcasket eltex sword, only available when using Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates, as well as patches for Royalty, Persona Bond Forge and Vanilla Psycasts Expanded.
